unnormalised: Hey folks, solar rooftop subsidies are awesome, right? My cousin Priya in Chennai got one last year. Reduced her electricity bill like crazy! Heard the scheme is extending to smaller towns now. Gotta check if my village near Madurai qualifies. Imagine, making biryani without worrying about the AC bill! Happy Onam to the electricity grid! Need to save those Rs. for Diwali sweets too! This is the future, yaar! GOI doing good!
